pub_created_display: Ardashir I (224 to 240), 1/6 Δ, Group / Mint B ("Hamadan")
issue_place_s: Group / Mint B ("Hamadan"), Media, Sasanian Empire
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: covered crown cap surmounted by covered korymbos; plain diadem; pendent diadem ribbons; cheek flaps; tunica; dotted border
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; square altar shaft; four altar slabs; altar flames depicted with vertical strokes; to the left and right mushroom-shaped bases supporting lion-paw structures; below left and right edge of altar table pendent diadem ribbonbelow left and right edge of altar table pendent diadem ribbon; dotted border
issue_reverse_legend_s: 11 h l. o.  NWRA ZY- 2 h l. i. 'rthštr| ādur ī Ardašīr| “the fire of Ardashir”; two dots on lowest element of altar table (SNS 1, var.6)
issue_references_s: SNS 1 Type IIIb/3b var. head to the left
